Title: Relates to the institution of a screening, brief intervention and referral to treatment/evaluation (SBIRT/SBIRE) at colleges
Summary: Relates to the institution of a screening, brief intervention and referral to treatment/evaluation (SBIRT/SBIRE) at colleges.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the institution of a screening, brief intervention and referral to treatment/evaluation (SBIRT/SBIRE) at colleges
